title: Gumroad
description: Learn how to design your first Case study as a beginner!"Navigating your First UI/UX Case Study" e-book is unique because of... The detailed step-by-step guide on how to create your first UI/UX Case Study as a beginner. The links to helpful resources for Case Study. The tips on promoting your case study on social media and reaching a wider audience. The practical tips based on my UI/UX journey. Tips for UI design Important checklist for UI designs Who can benefit from reading this e-book? Beginners: who are just breaking into the field of UI/UX design and who struggles with creating their UI/UX Case Study. UI/UX students who need guidance on their first case study. Aspiring freelancers who want to showcase their UI/UX design skills to potential clients through a case study. What will you find inside? What is Design User Experience (UX) and User Interface (UI) Design Thinking Business type & Fundamentals of Usability Discover Define Ideate Design Presentation 📖 What you will achieve by reading this? I created this e-book to help you overcome your fear and work on a basic UI/UX Case study project.🔗 Connect with me on Social :Connect with me on LinkedinFollow me on InstagramThankyou !
